DOC.brief_summary: A school base pedometer competition among Year 9 pupil ( 12 - 14 year old ) promote physical activity ( PA ) .
DOC.brief_title: The StepSmart Project : A Pedometer Based Phased Intervention Encourage Physical Activity Schools
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention separate three main phase . Phase One : A 10-week school competition use pedometer range non-financial incentive e.g . t-shirt , pen , badge etc . ( April - June 2015 ) . Phase Two : End school competition participant still keep pedometer . We set various challenge summer keep active ( July - Oct 2015 ) . Phase Three : Removal extrinsically motivation factor . Focus PA maintenance .
